snippet: The University of Minnesota-Duluth, ties and loses to Michigan Tech--and falls behind Minnesota in one poll. The Bulldogs are still projected to be the top seed in the N.C.A.A. Tournament.
abstract: The University of Minnesota-Duluth, ties and loses to Michigan Tech--and falls behind Minnesota in one poll. The Bulldogs are still projected to be the top seed in the N.C.A.A. Tournament.
lead_paragraph: Throughout the college hockey season, Slap Shot will feature reports about some of the country's top-ranked teams.

headline.main: A Bruising Weekend for Minnesota Duluth
